results.title: Idiopathic aquagenic pruritus: pathogenesis and effective treatment with atenolol.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Pruritus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@Idiopathic aquagenic pruritus@@@: pathogenesis and effective treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Cao T, Yong AA, Tan KB, Tey HL. Idiopathic aquagenic pruritus: pathogenesis and effective treatment with atenolol. Dermatol Ther. 2015 May-Jun;28(3):118-21. PMID: 25640024
citations.BibTeX: @article{25640024, title={Idiopathic aquagenic pruritus: pathogenesis and effective treatment with atenolol.}, author={Cao T and Yong AA and Tan KB and Tey HL}, journal={Dermatol Ther}, volume={28}, number={3}, pages={118-21}}

results.title: [Acquired sideroblastic anemia and cholestasis in a hyperthyroid patient treated with methimazole and atenolol].
results.text_hl: The authors describe a 62 year-old white male who was diagnosed as @DISEASE_Graves_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006111 @@@autoimmune hyperthyroidism@@@ and treated with @CHEMICAL_Methimazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008713 @@@methimazole@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. Ten days later he showed @<m>DISEASE_Pruritus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011537 @@@itching@@@, @DISEASE_Jaundice @DISEASE_MESH:D007565 @@@jaundice@@@ and choluria.

citations.NLM: Mamianetti A, Muñoz A, Ronchetti RD, Maccione E, Poggi U, Mugnolo R, Gallo O. [Acquired sideroblastic anemia and cholestasis in a hyperthyroid patient treated with methimazole and atenolol]. Medicina (B Aires). 1995;55(6):693-6. PMID: 8731582
